smallcase - Lead Backend Engineer

Location - Bengaluru, India, Work Type: Full Time

It July 01, 2022

We’re looking for an analytical, result-driven lead who will work with team members to troubleshoot and improve current back-end applications and processes.

Responsibilities

  • Own and manage team processes, releases, and systems
  • Working with the product and business teams to identify scopes of improvements
  • Design and develop databases for real-time, high availability financial data
  • Will be working with MongoDB, Redis, Javascript, Node.js
  • Architect and build the backend for corresponding web service (Nodejs and related frameworks)
  • Identify engineering targets, monitoring, reports, alerts requirements
  • Hire, mentor, and develop a motivated engineering team

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of experience with working with Backend Technologies
  • Experience Managing teams
  • Strong systems, architecture and database fundamentals, experience with scaling web technologies
  • Prior experience with Javascript (Node.js), MongoDB
  • Interest (and/or experience) in the financial/stock market space - interest trumps experience
Apply

smallcase - Lead Data Engineer

smallcase is building a modern investing ecosystem - better investment products & technology platforms for the Indian capital markets - serving over 5mn individual investors & India's most trusted & respected financial brands. We are a young, passionate 300+ member team headquartered in Bangalore & are backed by top-tier investors. smallcase has also been recognized in the ecosystem & media as an innovator & change agent.
